DOC.brief_title: Bladder ARFI ( Acoustic Radiation Force Impulse ) Study
DOC.detailed_description: Urinary bladder fibrosis relatively uncommon child . Traditionally , presence urinary bladder fibrosis confirm directly bladder biopsy use urodynamic testing . We use ARFI ( acoustic radiation force impulse ) -derived shear wave velocity potentially identify presence urinary bladder wall fibrosis . We hypothesize shear wave velocity obtain within bladder wall increase increase evidence fibrosis .
